summary: Babymetal is a Japanese band that mixes heavy metal music with the cute, or "kawaii," style of Japanese pop culture. The group is made up of three members: Su-metal, Moametal, and Momometal. They are known for their powerful vocals and energetic dances. Originally part of a larger idol group, Babymetal became independent in 2013. They have released four albums and toured worldwide. In 2018, one of the original members left due to health issues, and a new member joined the band in 2023.
title: Babymetal
